DataElement.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a person has discontinued any action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process prior to registration as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having discontinued any action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process prior to registration as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Discontinued Prior Registration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Discontinued; stopped permanently or temporarily.:Earlier in time or order.:The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.
The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has all prior therapy directe
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including immunologic agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all prior therapy (chemotherapy) directed at the malignant tumor been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, biologic/targeted, and immunological agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to today?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, biologic/targeted (non-cytotoxic) agents and immunologic agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy and immunologic agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, biologic/targeted (non-cytotoxic) agents and immunological agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to today?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including biological and immunological agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks of today?

ReferenceDocuments.name: GOG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Will all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, biologic/targeted (non-cytotoxic) agents, and immunological agents be discontinued for at least three weeks prior to start of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, biologic/targeted, and immunological agents, been discontinued for at least three weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has any other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy and radiation therapy, been discontinued for at least 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has all other prior therapy directed at the malignant tumor, including chemotherapy, targeted agents, immunologic agents and any investigational agent been discontinued for at least 4 weeks prior to registration (6 weeks for nitrosoureas or mitomycin C)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were  the following  prior therapies,  transfusion, hematopoietic agents, granulocyte-colony stimulating factor and/or oxygen supplementation, discontinued at least 7 days prior to required lab work?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received  transfusion, hematopoietic agents, granulocyte-colony stimulating factor and/or oxygen supplementation within 7 days prior to required lab work?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has other prior therapy been discontinued at least 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient discontinue prednisone or its equivalent fourteen (14) days prior to enrollment unless otherwise indicated in the protocol?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Assessments Ind-2 2018320v1.0 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
